snippet: United States stocks turned positive toward the end of trade, but the gains weren’t enough to make up for a plunge in markets after China’s main index fell sharply Monday.
abstract: Stocks in United States make small gains but cannot make up for large losses day before.
lead_paragraph: United States stocks turned positive toward the end of trade, but the gains weren’t enough to make up for a plunge in markets after China’s main index fell sharply Monday.

headline.main: Relatively Stable Trading in Stocks a Day After Sell-Offs
headline.print_headline: Relatively Stable Trading a Day After Sell-Offs
